description: He is Moritaka`s father and Nobuhiro older brother. At high school, he was a team captain of Judo club. Since Nobuhiro become a mangaka and passed away because that, at first he think he will oppose it if Moritaka want to do that, but lately he changed his mind and persuade his wife to support Moritaka`s dream. He is a fan of manga too, and his understand about Nobuhiro`s manga more than anyone else. He`s not appear in Moritaka`s workplace yet, but he encouraged Moritaka over the phone.
name: Mashiro Masahiro
